ISSUE.TITLE: Move "-DELETED" suffix to the defaults
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We use the "-DELETED" suffix as the string literal see [this link](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/4.70-bug-fixes/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Customers/CustomerService.cs#L349-L355). We may move it into the NopCustomerServicesDefaults class

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7423 Added new synchronous Delete method into IRepository
